title: Townhouse
posting_body: This NICE newly construction (9 years old) townhouse available either Sep 1st 2022 consists of 3 bedrooms, living room, Laundry room, two bathrooms, kitchen with breakfast counter top and dinning area, central air, stains till appliance, hardwood, tile and Berber bedroom flooring's, garage, storage room, utility room, sliding doors to a deck and more.
To view this nice townhouse you need to contact Silvino Cabral (the owner) at 978 502 4045 to make an appointment.
Marlboro, Marlborough, Framingham, Natick, Hopkinton, Southboro, Southborough, Northboro, Northborough, Stow, Acton, Grafton, Boylston, Berlin, Clinton, Wayland, Sudbury, Milford, Medway.
Concord, Beverly, Marshfield, Needham, MetroWest, Metro West, Cambridge, Somerville, Boston.
